description: Cloud cost optimization and forecasting tool. Provides cost anomaly detection, spending trends, reserved instance recommendations, and waste identification.
explanation: Critical for CTOs managing cloud budgets. Identifies cost anomalies, forecasts spending, recommends reserved instance purchases, and detects unused resources.
semanticDescription: Analyze cloud spending patterns, detect anomalies, forecast future costs, and recommend cost optimization strategies including reserved instances and resource cleanup.
usageExamples: Analyze cloud spending for the last 30 days and identify trends
Detect cost anomalies and unusual spending patterns
Forecast next month's cloud spending based on historical data
Recommend reserved instance purchases to reduce costs
Identify unused resources and estimate savings from cleanup
inputGuidance: Inputs must include 'action'. Cloud provider parameters are optional and use defaults.

inputDefinitions.name: action
inputDefinitions.description: The cost analysis action to perform

inputDefinitions.name: days
inputDefinitions.description: Number of days to analyze. Defaults to 30.

inputDefinitions.name: forecast_days
inputDefinitions.description: Number of days to forecast. Defaults to 30.

inputDefinitions.name: cloud_provider
inputDefinitions.description: Cloud provider to analyze. Defaults to 'aws'.

inputDefinitions.name: account_id
inputDefinitions.description: Cloud account ID or project to analyze

inputDefinitions.name: anomaly_threshold
inputDefinitions.description: Percentage change threshold for anomaly detection (0-100). Defaults to 20.

inputDefinitions.name: confidence_level
inputDefinitions.description: Confidence level for recommendations: low, medium, high. Defaults to 'medium'.

inputDefinitions.name: waste_threshold_percent
inputDefinitions.description: Minimum utilization percentage to flag as waste. Defaults to 10.

outputDefinitions.name: spending_analysis
outputDefinitions.description: Detailed breakdown of cloud spending by service, region, and cost center

outputDefinitions.name: anomalies
outputDefinitions.description: Detected cost anomalies with severity and potential causes

outputDefinitions.name: cost_forecast
outputDefinitions.description: Forecasted costs with confidence intervals and trend analysis

outputDefinitions.name: ri_recommendations
outputDefinitions.description: Reserved instance recommendations with estimated savings

outputDefinitions.name: waste_report
outputDefinitions.description: Identified waste and unused resources with cleanup recommendations

outputDefinitions.name: cost_trends
outputDefinitions.description: Historical cost trends and growth rate analysis
